m1.name: Young Rogue
m1.text: Quick fingers, quicker wit... your gold's already mine, friend!

m2.name: Weary Warrior
m2.text: I've buried too many brothers... but I'll bury more if I must.

m3.name: Fierce Fighter
m3.text: You want a fight?! I'll paint these walls with your blood!

m4.name: Wise Elder
m4.text: Age brings power, child... power you cannot yet comprehend.

f1.name: Young Hope
f1.text: Every sunrise brings new possibilities! I can feel destiny calling!

f2.name: Hardened Survivor
f2.text: Trust is a luxury I can't afford... stay back, or regret it.

f3.name: Sorrowful Soul
f3.text: The pain never leaves... it just learns to hide behind my smile.

f4.name: Elder Sage
f4.text: Come closer, dear one... let these old hands mend what's broken.
